website_summaries.verdict: Honeywell's Lyric C1 is a solid, straightforward indoor security camera with more features than you'd expect for the price.
pros: The $120 Honeywell Lyric C1 Wi-Fi Security Camera has free cloud storage, local storage via an included 8GB card, motion zones and geofencing capabilities
cons: It doesn't currently work with any smart home platforms

customer_reviews.title: Speaker volume is disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Image quality is great, app is very well done, but unfortunately the two way audio portion falls flat. The speaker on the camera is just too quiet for anyone or anything to hear you. The primary reason we bought this was to talk to our dog, but he can't hear us at all. Honeywell tech support was great and sent us a replacement, but it's just a bad. The speaker just isn't powerful enough to be useful.
customer_reviews.author: teephil

customer_reviews.title: View doesn’t rotate but still a good product
customer_reviews.text: This camara works well but it has it has flaws. I thought this was wonderful until I purchased a Wayze camara. The quality of the wayze picture and zoom and the ability to rotate the view on the Wayze is better than the Honeywell. However the Honeywell integrates beautifully with my alarm systems app and alerts me when it detects sound or movement. I’ll probably end up purchasing a few more Honeywells to put around just for the convenience of integration with my alarm app . It gives peace of mind to be able to look in and listen but the rotating the view would be nice but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Momma Pap

customer_reviews.title: Close... But definitely a miss..
customer_reviews.text: Good- picture. Not a bad looking little camera. Lyric app functions well when it works. Bad- it gets really hot for some reason! If you like to use the app... It will not function if you are on a different wifi network.. ie:work. The speaker and microphone are basically useless. I bought this to go with my lyric alarm system. Would you believe that the lyric camera is not compatible with the lyric alarm?? Well it isn't.
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: This camera is cool! It works for what I need it for. The motion sensor and sound work well. The camera will send the notification that motion was detected almost immediately. The notification goes to your phone. The night vision works well. I like that you can talk through the camera when you're away and you can take still photos from the live feed. It was also a breeze to set up and a monthly subscription is not required. The camera also comes with a micro SD card. This is a great purchase and I am glad I found it on Amazon. This same camera is around $119 at Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: For cheap - it works. So so quality cam and horrid sound (as others have said)
customer_reviews.text: I have a Honeywell HVAC unit and this works with the same app (why I got this cam). Simply put this is a cheap cam that works. The controls are simple. It does the job for the price. The cons are as others have said - worthless sound quality, lots of false positives even with a light coming on (on a timer) and such. Night vision is meh. Just know this is a basic cam that does work well with app and you get what you pay for. This works for my need.
customer_reviews.author: Star Wars Fan

customer_reviews.title: Really nice camera
customer_reviews.text: I have been really happy with this purchase. Setup was simply in about 10 minutes using the Honeywell Lyric app. Its detects motion and sound, sending alerts through the app and email. Solid night vision as well. Broad 150 degree visibility from a corner stand. You do need to tweak the sensitivity as the motion sense can pickup changes in light from trucks rolling by.
customer_reviews.author: Aepitaz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera. Awesome price.
customer_reviews.text: These cameras are amazing. Very clear and I love the notifications that I get. The only issue was the initial set up. The directions that came in the box were not helpful at all. I had to have a friend come over and figure it out for me. Once they were up and running I don’t know how I ever lived without them!Awesome camera. Awesome price. The app is super easy to use! Great camera for a even better price!!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: Fair. Get what you pay for. Only detects motion from inside through a window for short distance.. not a continuous monitor only brief clips. Inexpensive monitoring $5 a month.. Nest is the perfect system but much more money.
customer_reviews.author: CallsignVIPER

customer_reviews.title: Used Product Issues
customer_reviews.text: Because the camera was previously linked to another account and never deleted I spent nearly 2 hours trying to get it registered on the Honeywell network to no avail. Honeywell's solution was to email the previous owner and get back to me within 7 days and let me know if they've deleted it. Unsatisfactory..
customer_reviews.author: Eric E.Roman

customer_reviews.title: Secure and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and use. Mobile app exceptional and having the ability to purchase the extra monthly video storage if you want is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: SanMan

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable for critical monitoring applications
customer_reviews.text: When they work they work just fine. But they are often off line without warning and no way to remotely reset. If you are looking to use them for monitoring something critical (like an elderly parent who wants to live alone), these are not the cameras. If you are looking for a novelty, then they are probably fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Unreliable. I get many notifications of motion alerts that never get logged in the system. The motion detection only works for distances less than 5 feet. The quality of the night vision is very poor. This is a product that isn't ready for market. This is a rough draft version of a security camera.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mcginnis

customer_reviews.title: See above
customer_reviews.text: This type of solution is a requirement for a 90-year-old person to be able to live in place at Home without physical assistance Video works fine Audio no good without a high volume choice A safe and effective home solution for the elderly must have Loud voice and video zoom capability to read pharmacy labels etc.
customer_reviews.author: donald s.

customer_reviews.title: Unable To Complete Setup
customer_reviews.text: Could not get unit to connect with my Android smartphone. Downloaded the app and followed app instructions. Step 2 calls for unit to flash blue and hit "Next" button, so that phone can discover the camera. This step failed numerous times. Called customer, technical support and they asked me to do a reset twice. Even after a reset, the pairing never was possible. Returned unit.
customer_reviews.author: Chargeon2

customer_reviews.title: Garbage software
customer_reviews.text: Can’t comment on camera quality because I attempted to create an account and login for almost an hour and was unable too. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Security
customer_reviews.text: It’s working very well. No problems. Tied into my Honeywell app along with my other camera
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Carosella

customer_reviews.title: Security camera
customer_reviews.text: We have several of these cameras. The oldest is 3yrs. They have gotten much better with the updates. We actually use two as kid cameras and work well.
customer_reviews.author: H. Pressley Robinson III

customer_reviews.title: Be Sure This is the Camera you Want.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is intended only for commercial installation. Tech support would not even talk to me as a retail customer.
customer_reviews.author: SGS

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: just use it ehne I need to I like it for wha I need it for
customer_reviews.author: sue sue

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's a plug in and don't have to deal with batteries. Picture quality is excellent and the app works very well
customer_reviews.author: Barry V

customer_reviews.title: Why you need this
customer_reviews.text: We loved the quality compared to most nanny cams. Plus alerting us if there is as n alsrm going off in the room is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Home S.

customer_reviews.title: One out of three units ordered defective
customer_reviews.text: Two that worked provide high quality video. Defective unit would not connect & Amazon had closed the return window! Don’t purchase unless you are installing right away!!
customer_reviews.author: scubamike

customer_reviews.title: Complete junk.
customer_reviews.text: Never could get it to work, despite spending hours with useless tech support (and another hour on hold before I got through) . Stay away. Then, I could not even return it: Honeywell said that Amazon handled warranty claims and Amazon denied that.
customer_reviews.author: Greenpond

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!!
customer_reviews.text: Very Clear picture. It helps to have good bandwidth on your network.
customer_reviews.author: RickMotter

customer_reviews.title: Eh, its ok
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I'm not that impressed. I was very excited to get this product, I paid $115, and then the price dropped...which was a bummer. It doesn't do as much as I thought it did, I can't figure out how to record to, or access the 'cloud' , without turning on the annoying sensors. I guess I'm pretty disappointed, I've thought about returning it, but maybe Honeywell will release some updates for it...idk. on the plus side, the video quality and sound quality and pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: Works with honeywell home
customer_reviews.text: I had written a review stating that these cameras didn't work with honeywell home. I was mistaken... the bluetooth on my phone was not working. These cameras do work with honeywell home
customer_reviews.author: justsomedude

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This camera is unable to connect remotely 90% of the time. When it does connect, it takes over 60 seconds to load. It is also constantly going offline. And don't bother trying to get support help because it is nonexistent.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind but not a constant stream.
customer_reviews.text: Camera works pretty good. 30 seconds of video only not a constant stream of motion is sensed. Good for peace of mind to look at live feed.
customer_reviews.author: Window of a glass

customer_reviews.title: Not really happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Not really happy with this product: there’s no volume control for the two way audio, when you speak through your phone via the app its hard to hear on Lric C1 speaker. I also notice the device is hot when you touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Thomas Jones

customer_reviews.title: A easy to install addition
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for use in our home. They were easy to set up and work OK. However there needs to be a audio setting between low and off. The microphone is constantly sensing signals when the HVAC comes on which causes the unit to repeatedly send messages that sound was detected. The night vision is not real clear making it difficult to identify who is in the room however the daylight picture is real clear.. Otherwise I like the units and they conveniently helped fill a void in our homes security
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Bad Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to get these cameras to connect to my cell phone. I have talked to the Honeywell Support Group with no success.
customer_reviews.author: R Bahnson

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Very unreliable. Only works about half the time. “Unable to connect, please try again”
customer_reviews.author: Britton Pederson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t even able to set it up. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Sunil M

customer_reviews.title: App interface isn’t great and has a lot of bugs
customer_reviews.text: Turns off my randomly. App interface isn’t great and has a lot of bugs.
customer_reviews.author: David Bader

customer_reviews.title: Support from Honeywell was good, but could not solve the problem
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because the motion detection was totally unreliable, especially picking up motion when there was none. Support from Honeywell was good, but could not solve the problem. You cannot turn the camera with remote app. Cannot be moved when away from home. The Honeywell Wi-Fi thermostat has worked flawlessly. That is what I was expecting. Didn't get it.
customer_reviews.author: rnaser

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. I was out of town so I could not return.....Do not waste your $$$. Hard to get to Link to Wifi. Once there takes for ever and ever and ever to connect to the app. Buy Nest camera
customer_reviews.author: Mark L

customer_reviews.title: Delayed alerts, will return
customer_reviews.text: The camera is small, has a fantastic picture, but is on its way back because it doesn’t respond fast enough meaning the alerts are not sent immediately. Also when watching the love feed you must refresh the picture over and over. That is very inconvenient when you’re using it as a baby camera. We have had the Nest and are happy with it. I just wanted to replace an old camera with this one, but will go back to the nest.
customer_reviews.author: PA-C2016

customer_reviews.title: There is a lot of other products that work much better.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a total rip off. It goes off repeatedly for motions that don't exist. The speaker feature that claims you can talk to anyone that is in the house during an alarm is so quiet that you cannot hear anything unless your ear is right next to the unit. Do Not Purchase this item. There is a lot of other products that work much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lees

product_meta.title: Honeywell Home C1 Indoor Wi-Fi Security Camera
product_meta.description: The Honeywell C1 Security Camera lets you connect to your home 24/7. From a leader in professionally monitored security systems, the C1 camera is a versatile way for you to monitor home, pets, and family - anytime, anywhere. “C1 is a solid, straightforward indoor security camera with more features than you'd expect for the price.” – CNET 8/11/17
feature_bullets: 2 ADJUSTABLE ALERT ZONES: Draw your own alert zones for extra sensitivity or to ignore background motion like a ceiling fan. Motion & audio detection included with 30-second clips & 5-second pre-event triggers.

NEVER MISS A MOMENT: C1 comes with free secure cloud storage to stream & download clips and, in case of a wifi outage, an 8GB SD card is included for backup. The 256-Bit data encryption keeps your private information safe.
LIVE, LOOK-IN VIDEO: HD video from your C1 camera direct to your Honeywell Home app means that you can check in on what matters most right on your smartphone or tablet, wherever you are.
INTELLIGENT SOUND DETECTION: Recognizes specific sounds such as certain smoke & carbon monoxide alarms. Get mobile alerts sent to yourself, family or friends.
WORKS WITH AMAZON ALEXA: Already compatible with your smart home with the commands like “Alexa, discover my devices”, “Alexa, turn cameras on” and “Alexa, show me the baby’s room”.

2-WAY TALK & GEOFENCE TECHNOLOGY: Communicate from anywhere with what you see or hear at home. Different control options adapt to your location using geofence technology to automatically turn the camera on or off. Use it in Home and Away modes.
SEE IN THE DARK: Night Vision allows you to see what’s happening at home at all hours.
SMART HOME SECURITY: Connect to your home 24/7, with 720p Full HD and wide-angle.
EASY, DIY SETUP: Get the C1 up and running in minutes. Features flexible mounting for wall or table top.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars113 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
